message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you for $180. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your value proposition, but I think we can reach a more agreeable price. How about $150?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value this product at a higher price point. Could you consider $165?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Let me see if I can meet you halfway. How about $155?
